scripts.build-peer: parcel build -t browser src/peer.html -d peer -o index.html
scripts.build-beacon: parcel build -t node src/beacon.ts -d beacon -o main.js
scripts.build: npm run build-peer; npm run build-beacon
scripts.clean: rm -r peer beacon .cache node_modules; npm ci
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean; npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run rebuild; gcloud app deploy
